actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of screening mammography for women at high risk of developing breast cancer, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Breast Cancer Screening Act of 1990 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover screening mammographies for women over age 34 at a frequency which varies on the basis of a woman's age and risk of developing breast cancer. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to implement procedures to notify eligible individuals of such coverage and promote its use.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of screening mammography for women at high risk of developing breast cancer, and for other purposes.
